text: Liu zai houfang de renmen, dang nimen wei huode zhanlipin er chufa de shihou, tamen jiang shuo:“Rang women gen nimen qu ba!” Tamen yu biangeng an la de pan ci. Ni shuo:“Nimen juedui bude gen women qu, yiqian, an la zheyang shuoguole.” Tamen jiang shuo:“Buran, nimen jidu women.” Buran tamen bu shen liaojie
